citation.title: The knowledge complexity of interactive proof-systems

wikipedia.title: Shafi Goldwasser
wikipedia.summary: Shafrira Goldwasser (born 1958) is an American-born Israeli computer scientist. She is a professor of electrical engineering and computer science at MIT, and a professor of mathematical sciences at the Weizmann Institute of Science, Israel.

q&a.title: References on Circuit Lower Bounds
q&a.summary:
Preamble
